name: Rent
description: One card in your opponent's queue affects your opponent instead of you. Receive $1,700.

immediateEffect.script: Player.Money += 1700; if (OpponentQueue.Count > 0) { int idx = Rng.Next(OpponentQueue.Count); var card = OpponentQueue[idx]; card.TargetSelf = true; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " collects rent ($1,700) and redirects " + card.Name + " at " + OpponentDisplayName + "!"); } else { Log(PlayerDisplayName + " collects rent ($1,700)!"); }
